item.title: Lesson 1.4: The Host Key
item.description: In this video, I’ll show you how to avoid getting stuck inside your newly created virtual machine (VM). It is essenetial that you know about, and understand how to use VirtualBox’s host key! Video Transcript No transcript yet… watch this space!
